item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Shubham Agarwal and I’ve been working as a freelance technology journalist for over three years. Here you can find my published work: https://www.makeuseof.com/tag/author/shubham/ https://techpp.com/author/shubham/ You can connect me with me over Email or Twitter.
